snippet.title: GHUNTER - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
GHUNTER is an action-adventure game about cooking. Uncover the mysteries of Garcosa, cook and hunt your prey, deliver delicious dishes to your customers and save the King with your dishes!

WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM!!!! https://store.steampowered.com/app/3156000/GHUNTER/

Coming to Steam in Novemeber!

Developed by Tiny Tavern studios.
